usergroupnameexists-error: Error message thrown when user inputs a name for a new user group when the name has already been taken.
usergroups-editgroup-delete: {{doc-important|Do not translate , Special:UserGroups/new, and .}} Toggle to delete this usergroup using [[Special:UserGroups]].
usergroups-editgroup-desc:
Description header for the main form page of [[Special:UserGroups]].

"create new..." should be consistent with {{msg-mw|Usergroups-createnew}}.
usergroups-editgroup-newgroup: Input textfield for the new usergroup's name
usergroups-editgroup-revoke: Toggle to determine if this usergroup should be part of $wgGroupPermissions or $wgRevokePermissions
usergroups-editgroup-save:
Used as label for the Submit button.
{{Identical|Save changes}}
usergroups-editgroup-userrights: The set of all available user rights.
invalidusergroupname-error:
Custom error message given when user enters invalid input into [[Special:UserGroups/new]].

Followed by "{{int:returnto|{{int:mainpage}}}}".

The title for this error is {{msg-mw|Invalidusergroupname-title}}.
nosuchusergroup:
Displays if the user enters an invalid user group name for [[Special:UserGroups]].

Parameters:
* $1 - the specified user group name
